entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Victoria Beach
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 2.
